meanings.definition: In the process of being worked on or completed.
meanings.sent1: The inwork project is almost finished.
meanings.sent2: The painter showed me her inwork masterpiece.
meanings.sent3: The inwork cake looked messy but tasted delicious.
meanings.sent4: Her inwork garden was a canvas of colors waiting to bloom.
meanings.sent5: The inwork puzzle was missing a few pieces, but it was coming together nicely.

meanings.definition: To be in the middle of working on something.
meanings.sent1: I am inwork on my science project for school.
meanings.sent2: She inwork diligently on her novel every evening.
meanings.sent3: The chef inwork on creating a new recipe for the menu.
meanings.sent4: The construction workers inwork on building the new bridge.
meanings.sent5: We inwork together to finish the group project before the deadline.
